title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Leadership Capacity-Building Course Based on Circular Economy and Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three approaches to applying circular economy principles based on real industry scenarios.
Learners can design and implement resource circulation optimization strategies in virtual simulation environments to achieve a waste reduction effect of 20% or more.
Learners can analyze the economic and environmental impacts of team solutions according to sustainability project evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
